category.name: Mail
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mail_server_ssl_protocol
preference.preference_description: Defines the connection security protocol between SMTP Mail Utility (Teamcenter) and Mail Server. This value depends on the Mail server configuration for SMTP. Valid Values: TLSv1_3, TLSv1_2, TLSv1_1, TLSv1, SSLv23. These are the only supported ssl/tls protocol.
